title: 请问怎么用指令生成有附魔钻石套的僵尸？
author: MinecraftPC1130
txt_content: 请问怎么用指令生成有附魔钻石套的僵尸？

replies.author: Jeansou
replies.txt_content:
dmin12 发表于 2019-8-21 15:01
这个网站可以生成这种指令
https://www.digminecraft.com/generators/summon_mob.php
/summon zombie ~ ~1 ~ {ArmorItems:[{Count:1,id:diamond_boots,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:unbreaking,lvl:2}]}},{Count:1,id:diamond_leggings,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}]}},{Count:1,id:diamond_chestplate,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}]}},{Count:1,id:diamond_helmet,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}]}}]}

replies.author: Jeansou
replies.txt_content:
这个网站可以生成这种指令
https://www.digminecraft.com/generators/summon_mob.php
